channel.title: Starting a 369 refactor(And then soon after a server)
channel.description:
Well, I was thinking about the old times of RuneScape with none of the trade limit and all that shit and I decided it would be fun too look into making a server for an older revision. (That was unique not 317 or 377) I chose 369 because it is all multiples of 3 and it's got 69 in it :D.
Anyways I will be working on refactoring the client and if anyone wants to join in on the project they are more than welcome. I have started with just a few simple things and will be continuing on this for a while.
If you would like to watch the progress it is at http://subversion.assembla.com/svn/369client/
When I get to writing a server I will probably use a 377 cache.

@Project_Evolution wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:10, topic:339712”][quote author=Project Evolution link=topic=436089.msg3207026#msg3207026 date=1273897188]
Were doing quite well so far. Refactored lots of shit like AppletStub and IsaacCipher and such. If you are interested in my progress I have everything mapped out here,

Free Web Hosting

Free Web Hosting - Your Website need to be migrated

Absolutely Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL, cPanel and no Ads!


However that does not include progress done by (Anthony).

POST PEOPLE.
[/quote]please tell me that page was dumped and not manually created…[/quote]

Im not dumping it yet, however im only keeping track of certain things im doing (dont ask, one of my buddies on MSN asked for it). Its only temporary.
